title: BlackRock’s Diorio: Clients Want More Access to Private Markets
description: Jonathan Diorio, head of U.S. Wealth Business and Head of Alternatives at BlackRock, discusses the firm’s private-markets separately managed account with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld. He says clients are seeking greater access to private markets. (Source: Bloomberg)
